short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspiring startup related quotes in every new Chrome tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With new quotes added every week, this extension will display an inspirational quote that anyone in the startup or business world can appreciate. If you would like to submit a new quote, simply tweet @matcarpenter.
